feed.title: MySpeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MySpeed: Release 1.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 🔐 Ookla Lizenzierungsabfrage hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/103
  • 📜 Einführung der Fehler-Logs by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/104
  • 📑 Erneuerung des Reset-Befehls in der Dokumentation by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/110
  • 🌐 Einführung mehrerer Sprachen by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/109
  • 🚀 Optimierungen am Code by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/134

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5

entry.title: New release for MySpeed: Release 1.0.6 | Bug-Fixes & Optimierungen
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Wörter angepasst - (Hat mich getriggert) by @pavl21 in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/135
  • ✨ Optimierungen am Dialog-System by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/208
  • 🐛 Wichtige Bug-Fixes im Server by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/209
  • ⏳ Loader beim Start der Seite hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/210
  • 🆕 Version 1.0.6 - Update by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6

entry.title: New release for MySpeed: Release 1.0.7 | Statistik, Toasts & Sammelansicht von Servern
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 📈 Neue Statistik-Seite by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/215
  • 👀 Dependencies wurden geupgradet by @dependabot (#219, #213, #217, #218, #222, #223, #224, #225, #226, #227, #228, #229, #230, #232, #233, #234, #236, #237, #238, #239, #240, #240, #241, #242, #243, #244, #245, #248, #249, #246, #250, #253, #254, #256)
  • 🗨️ Einführung der Toast-Nachrichten by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/220
  • 📑 Wiki-Seite "Konfiguration eines Reverse-Proxies" hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/251
  • 📦 Sammelansicht von Servern by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/252
  • 🆕 Version 1.0.7 - Update by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/255

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/compare/v1.0.6...v1.0.7

entry.title: New release for MySpeed: Release 1.0.8 | Integrationen & Bug-Fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 👀 Dependencies wurden geupgradet by @dependabot (#257, #259, #260, #261, #262, #263, #264, #265, #266, #267, #268, #269, #270, #271, #272, #273, #274, #275, #276, #277, #278, #279, #280, #281, #282, #283, #284, #285, #289, #290, #291, #292, #293, #294, #295, #296, #298, #299, #300)
  • 📑 README aktualisiert by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/258
  • 🌐 Automatisches setzen der Browser-Sprache by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/286
  • 🐛 Übersetzungs-Bug behoben by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/287
  • 🇩🇪 Deutsche Übersetzung überarbeitet by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/288
  • 🛠 Einführung von Integrationen by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/297
  • 🆕 Version 1.0.8 - Update by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/301

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/compare/v1.0.7...v1.0.8

entry.title: New release for MySpeed: Release 1.0.9 | Storage Management, LibreSpeed & Cloudflare Speed Support, ...
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 📑 Issue-Templates übersetzt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/302
  • 🌐 Dokumentation auf Englisch übersetzt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/303
  • 🌍 Unterstützung neuer Sprachen by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/307
  • 🚀 Optimierungen am Code by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/481
  • 👨‍💻 Entwicklungsinfo angepasst by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/482
  • 📩 Priorität zur Gotify-Integration hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/584
  • 🐛 Neustart triggert neuen Speedtest by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/585
  • 🔍 Demo-Modus hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/598
  • 💾 MySQL Support hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/674
  • 🐳 Dockerfile aktualisiert by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/675
  • 🌐 Sprachauswahl aktualisiert by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/676
  • 🗃️ Support für LibreSpeed & Cloudflare Speed by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/677
  • ⏩ Pushover Integration hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/679
  • 👋 Willkommensdialog hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/680
  • 💾 Storage Management hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/681
  • ☁️ Cloudflare-Fehler behoben by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/684
  • 👨‍💻 Interfaceauswahl hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/685
  • 🕒 Zeitzonen-Problem behoben by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/686
  • 🔥 Prometheus Endpunkt hinzugefügt by @gnmyt in https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/pull/687

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gnmyt/myspeed/compare/v1.0.8...v1.0.9
